instructions.display_text: Add the ice, kiwis, strawberries, oat milk, and spinach to a blender.
Blend on high speed until smooth.
Enjoy!

components.raw_text: ½ cup oat milk or milk of choice

compilations.name: 7 Unexpected Ways To Use Kitchen Scraps

instructions.display_text: Place watermelon, coconut water, and lime juice in blender and blend until smooth.
Serve over ice.
Enjoy!

compilations.name: 4 Fruit-Packed Refreshers
The Most Creative Ways To Eat Watermelon
Summer Watermelon Treats

compilations.description: Who says hydrating yourself needs to be boring? Sip on these delicious nutritious fruit drinks and make reaching your daily water intake so much more fun! Go for our watermelon coconut cooler or keep yourself cool with the frozen strawberry lemonade! So come on, 'water' you waiting for?
compilations.name: Fruit Drinks You Can Sip On All Day!
Beat The Heat With These Refreshing Drinks
compilations.description: We all love a refreshing drink when it gets hot: iced tea, lemonade, the works. But we're changing it up a bit. Our mango pineapple slushie is a hit no matter how hot it gets and our watermelon coconut cooler will make you feel like you're on a tropical getaway. Oh, and have you ever tried a grilled lemonade? Sun's out, drinks out!

compilations.name: Watermelon Season!
compilations.description: Watermelons are truly divine. They're sweet, juicy, and pretty and well, there are a bunch of things you can do with them. Make a quick watermelon slushie or pop some watermelon ice pops in the freezer for an easy snack. You can also make a fabulous lunch out of our soy and sriracha-loaded watermelon poke bowl. Who's ready for some watermelon sugar?

compilations.name: Easy Playdate Recipes For Your Kids

compilations.description: Tired of your friends calling you a prude when it's happy hour? No worries 'cause we're here to help you win them over with 10 amazingly refreshing mocktails. Be it Faux-Jito, Roseberry Mule, or Grilled Lemonade, these fruity drinks will lighten up any house party and just cure your mid-week blues! Time to challenge your inner mixologist!
compilations.name: 10 Mocktails to Blow Away Your Monday Blues
The Best House Party Mocktails!
compilations.description: Hosting a party? Mix up some of these epic mocktails! House parties are all about experimenting with new drinks and we've compiled a list of some of the best, unique mocktails to make you the host with the most! Try our Roseberry Mule Mocktail, Elegant 4th Of July Ice Cubes, or our Cranberry Rosemary Herb Soda! These are gonna take you to the top of your party game!

results.description: This content is intended solely for users of legal drinking age. Drink responsibly.

instructions.display_text: In a large pitcher, pour hot water over tea bags letting steep 5 minutes.
Bring syrup ingredients to boil, then reduce heat to medium.
Strain syrup through a fine strainer to remove fruit pieces.
Add syrup and whiskey to tea, then chill until ready to serve.
Serve over ice, with sliced peaches, sliced lemons and a mint sprig.
Enjoy!

results.name: Peach Iced Tea Whiskey

compilations.name: Party Punch Recipes For Your Next House Party
12 Drinks That Will Make You Look Like a Pro
Refreshing And Healthy Ways To Eat Fruit
Refreshing Summer Drinks
compilations.description: Thirsty for some fun and refreshing drinks this summer season? Look no further and try these out! The best part about these cocktails is that all of them, like the raspberry mojito or the berry vodka sunrise, are made with colorful fruits and are very easy to put together. These delicious drinks will cool you down and keep you hydrated all summer long.

compilations.name: Teas For Every Day Of The Week
compilations.description: Kickstart your Monday with a Matcha Latte and have some mid-week fun with homemade tapioca pearl milk tea. You can even bring in the weekend with a spiked Lavendar Hot Toddy. Trust us, there's a tea for every day and mood!

compilations.name: Cocktails Based On Your Zodiac Sign
compilations.description: Zodiac signs don't lie, at least that's what we believe, so we're bringing each zodiac sign their favorite cocktails to ring in the best weather. Brew some Whiskey Iced Tea for the tenacious Taurus. If you're a trendy Leo, sip on a tropical Mimosa Sangria Float. And the Cherry Moscow Mule will hit the right spot for the adventurous Sagittarius. Drink to your stars!

We bet you're already ready for summer adventures, but these recipes will get you super psyched. Kick off your day with some melon salad for breakfast and indulge in this epic peach iced tea whiskey throughout the day. Whether you want to cool off, usher in the sun, or stay cool, these recipes are here for all your summer needs!
compilations.name: 7 Recipes To Get You Psyched For Summer
Tasty's Top Drinks!
compilations.description: Summertime is splash time, and we're bringing the splash to your cup with a bar full of liquid love! If you're in the mood for some chocolaty goodness, you should test out the Dairy Free Chocolate & Mint Milkshake and if you're hosting a fancy luncheon, give our Blackberry Whiskey Lemonade a spin. We've got all the bases covered, now it's your turn to decide.

recipes.description: This content is intended solely for users of legal drinking age. Drink responsibly.
recipes.name: Mixed Berry Sangria

compilations.name: Sangria 4 Ways

compilations.description: One of the best things about summer is outdoor eating, especially picnics. Find a spot in the middle of nowhere, lay a blanket, bring some food, and spend the whole day chilling and eating. The dream! From a 20-minute watermelon and cucumber salad to fruit and cream cheese pastries, these recipes are great picnic ideas for two. And if you want your afternoon to get a little boozy, we highly recommend this mixed berry sangria that’s basically summer in a cup.
compilations.name: Summer Picnic For Two
7 Bubbly Spiked Drinks to Cool You Down

instructions.display_text: In a large pitcher, combine the blackberries, strawberries, blueberries, red wine, brandy, and apple juice.
Stir until mixed.
Chill for at least 4 hours.
Add the lemon-lime soda, then serve with a strawberry on each glass.
Enjoy!
In a large pitcher, combine the pineapples, mangoes, wine, brandy, and pineapple juice. Stir until mixed.
Chill for at least 4 hours.
Add the soda, then serve with a pineapple wedge on each glass.
Enjoy!

compilations.description: Tired of drinking the same old beer in your fridge? These fancy and easy cocktails are the perfect way to kick things up a notch! Make yourself a glass of a psychedelic, color-changing frozen mojito and impress your friends with champagne popsicles at your next summer cocktail party.You'll be the hostess (or host) of the hour, that's our guarantee.
